title: Fantasy football rankings for Week 8: Aaron Rodgers fuels Packers' resurgent offense
text:
CLOSE Charles Curtis gives you fantasy studs, duds and sleepers for Week 8. USA TODAY

Fantasy football rankings for Week 8 are based on the point-per-reception (PPR) scoring used in most seasonal and daily fantasy football formats. One point is awarded for every 10 rushing and receiving yards and one point for every 20 passing yards. Six points are awarded for touchdowns scored, four points for passing TDs and one point for receptions.

On bye: Baltimore, Dallas

Rankings are compiled by FantasySharks.com. Updated Oct. 26

(*- Be sure to check injury/status before kickoff)

description: With Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers coming off a six-TD game, he and RB Aaron Jones are in the fantasy top five at their positions in Week 8.
